summary: An Ordinance repealing Ordinance No. 24888, entitled, "An Ordinance providing for the changing and establishing of the curb grades of the alley through Block Thirty-five (35), in Capitol Hill Addition to the City of Seattle, Division No. Five (5); providing for the condemnation, appropriation, taking and damaging of land and other property necessary for the grading and regrading of said alley, in conformity with such established grades, and for the construction of the slopes for cuts and fills upon the property abutting upon said alley, and providing that the payment for such improvement be made, by special assessment upon the property specially benefited, in the manner provided by law;" approved August 22, 1910, and published August 24, 1910.
